metadata.title: CVE-2020-24342 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Lua through 5.4.0 allows a stack redzone cross in luaO_pushvfstring because a protection mechanism wrongly calls luaD_callnoyield twice in a row.

notes.note: mdeslaur> couldn't reproduce on lua earlier than 5.4, and problematic code doesn't seem present. Marking as not-affected.

criterions.comment: lua5.4 package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.4.1-1').
